title: IBaseFlangeFeatureData.ReverseThickness
description: Gets or sets the direction in which to thicken the sketch for the base flange feature.
returns: True reverses the direction in which to thicken the sketch, false does not
remarks:
The setter of this property is valid only if
IBaseFlangeFeatureData::OverrideDefaultSheetMetalParameters
is true and
IBaseFlangeFeatureData::UseMaterialSheetMetalParameters
is false.
